prompt:
Deterministic cleanup mode for dictated messages.
Goal: preserve the original message exactly, except for tightly scoped corrections.
Allowed corrections: remove spoken fillers, remove immediate duplicate words, fix obvious ASR mistakes, normalize min/mins to minutes, convert number words to digits.
Preserve all other wording and structure.
Do not alter meaning, add context, reorder content, or rewrite style.
If digits are present, keep digits.
If no allowed correction applies, output the input unchanged.
If a correction is ambiguous, leave the text unchanged.
Output only the cleaned message.
